Name: argon to generic market for inert gas for discharge lamps | inert gas for discharge lamps | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6822/documentation

This is a linking activity. Several different noble gases (or their mixtures) can be used as an inert gas for gas-discharge lamps. This linking activity separate the production volume of argon which is later on used as inert gas in gas-discharge lamps and link it to the generic market for inert gas for discharge lamps.

This is a linking activity, i.e. nothing is produced in this activity.
